attributes.action: Allow British Citizens to hold EURO accounts in a UK bank without Capital Gains tax charges arrising from exchange rate fluctuations.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People should be allowed to vote with their feet on the Euro. Those who want to stay with Sterling, should be allowed to do so. The first step is to allow accounts in Euros to be held in your local bank. Eventually it should be allowable to be paid in Euros directly to the bank, with nominal currency conversion charges.
